title: Psychosomatics of back pain and the use of yoga.
summary: In this article, a review is given of the psychosomatic aspect of back pain and the use of multi-dimensional methods of managing back pain. Major emphasis is given to the techniques of yoga....
abstract: In this article, a review is given of the psychosomatic aspect of back pain and the use of multi-dimensional methods of managing back pain. Major emphasis is given to the techniques of yoga.
